ModMetaData.name: Remove All Bodyparts (Continued)

ModMetaData.description:
Update of LingLuos mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1208746347
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/emipa606/RimWorld-Wrapper/master/Notice.png[/img]

Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/RemoveAllBodyParts
Updating-work was partially done by user: Markus
This mod lets you remove all bodyparts including the ones not possible before like fingers, various bones or whatever your corrupted mind desires. --- Original Description --- You can remove all bodypart ???????,?????????,????????,???? Chinese and English. can't with EPOE Sorry,I can't speak english well
